comments.commentBody: Maybe that explains why he would use his 20 something strength to hurt a senior citizen. Rage from roids is so 20th century.
Why doesn't MLB institute a policy that 2nd time offender's lose their entire year's salary and the contract become non-guaranteed? That will teach them pretty quick I think.
Hate to read those snide, no-class comments. Oh ... wait ... they're from Yankee fans. Never mind, my mistake.

Tim from El Cajon can tell his gransdon that baseball players are people who play baseball.  They are not heroes, they are not geniuses.  Manny took drugs.  He's a baseball player who ruined his career.

The sorry state of baseball reflects the sorry state of our good ol' U S of A.  Cheaters everywhere.  Many of them with seven figure incomes.  What ever happened to making choices in life based on what is right, not what you can get away with?  Why do we continue to reward the wrong people in our society?  We better wake up soon, the ship is half sunk.

One more obstacle out of the way on the long road baseball has to respectabilty.
Not good timing for Bonds, but hopefully he gets his due as well. As a life long baseball fan, I'm close to throwing my hands up at Selig's and the union's willful inability to clean up the game.
robe

Baseball is a form of entertainment.  If the point of the entertainment is to see excellence in the form of great hitting, pitching and fielding, then the most talented and dedicated players will be even more entertaining if they augment their training and abilities with whatever techniques are available, efficacious and safe.  If the point of the entertainment however is to watch players who avoid certain enhancement techniques, then we must accept the lower levels of excellence we will be watching in terms of the mechanics of the game.  The problem is, we as consumers of this entertainment seem to want to be able to have both.
Manny and Ortiz never tested positive in the years 2004 and 2007.
Boy, this is right on target Andy. We can't really appreciate what we haven't experienced or don't have powerful reminders of.

The image of "tsunami tablets" is poignant. Here in Oregon, the limited "disaster memory" we have is not even the right kind. Most new Oregon residents (the last 10 years or so) have never experienced an earthquake here, and long-time Oregonians remember a few crustal-fault earthquakes of limited extent and damage (the "Spring Break Quake" of 1993, etc.). Nothing in recent or historical memory equips us to imagine and prepare for the risk of a great earthquake and tsunami on the Cascadia fault. The most recent is not 3 generations remote; it is more than 10 generations remote. It is inconceivable.

What we need here in Oregon is not memory, but science. And the science of Cascadia is charging ahead much faster than either public awareness or public policy. Cascadia now has the best-documented seismic history of any subduction zone in the world, and the findings offer little comfort. Can science -- plus the powerful example of analogous earthquakes like Japan's 9.0 -- motivate society to move in a case where memory offers no guidance? We'll see.
Joe Bastardi also predicted a colder than normal winter for most of the northeast and midwest when he was with Accuweather.

Until we seal our borders and enforce the 1986 Immigration Reform and Control Act, we are never going to stop the spiraling 14 Trillion plus US Treasury deficit. We must put an end to instant citizen birthright for infants of illegal aliens and stop the hemorrhaging of  money from  States education and free health Care It is known now that 200.000 babies in this nation and the burden of welfare falls on the backs of hard-pressed taxpayers. We can no longer afford the Liberal progressives Tax and Spend doctrine for the 20 million plus illegal aliens who have settled here. Every patriotic American must embrace the TEA PARTY  CAUCUS, that in reality is a splinter organization of tens of millions divorced from the Republican elites. Only the TEA PARTY now is our salvation from the billions of dollars, to support foreign nationals and their families and the unceasing avalanche that arrives by jet as overstays on expired visas and through the undermanned borders.

What I find amazing is that until recently, Republicans were only hoping that a shutdown would make Obama look bad. I have heard from various sources that top Republican leaders like Mitch McConnell have one goal: make Obama a one-term president. When we elect politicians who are complete nihilists (i.e. they don't actually care what happens to the country, they just care about playing the game), there are serious consequences.

Ironically, I do believe Obama cares about what happens to our country. He's trying to be noble and stay above the ceaseless partisan bickering. The problem is when everyone else is playing the game, you play too or you make concessions you never intended to make. Constantly compromising with a party that refuses to compromise only gives the uncompromising party the message that they can get away with anything. I'm sorry Obama. I like you, but at this moment, when everyone else is playing the game, I wish you would play a little harder.

Messrs. Reid and Obama need lessons in negotiating.  When you give the other side more than they want, and then they move the bar, you don't chase them - you pull back in outrage and force them to chase you.  End of lesson.

Thank GOD, we live in California, where these dammed Republicans have no SAY. These ungly RICH,Racist, ungly-fat-Americans can only think of themselves and all the money they can pocket at the espenses of the poor. You are beyond hope of being ashamed, cowards!

Thank GOD, we live in California, where these ugly Republicans have no SAY. These bigots, filthy-rich, racist, fat-Americans can only think of themselves and all the money they can pocket, at the espenses of the poor. You are beyond hope of being ashamed you are cow*ards.

I want everyone on here to read this and think. While you read this, you are no longer a republican, democrat or Tea Party supporter. Read this thread yourself with out any labels and with an open mind.

Most Americans right now are clueless about the current situation pending with our government shut down. It sickens me to see people on these boards and other like minded boards from America still talking about rubbish. Everyone is so engulfed in finding the next big conspiracy that they are missing that the train heading down the tracks is about to hit them. (I will explain later on)

I see a lot of wisdom on these boards and another site i frequent. People who are unique, wise and capable of much more than your standard Joe Shmoe. It sad to see a lot of it going to waste though. If you made it this far more than likely you are someone who is meant to read this thread. I'm betting your someone who knows they are capable of much more than most. Now is your time to act! Now is your time to give others that wisdom that may indeed save their lives.

Right now if you turn on any major news network you will see talk of the pending government shut down in the USA. Everyone is focusing on the talks taking place, budget cuts, extensions, planned parenthood cuts and etc.

For a minute, lets take a step back! Lets forget all the none sense. Ask your self "what is really happening?"

- The US Dollar loosing value [link to www.torfx.com]

- Military Pay currently 1/2 (If you know anyone ask them to check their LES)

- We are fighting 3 wars (do i really need to link)

- Our "Government is out of money" google it

- Iran, China, Turkey and Russia are allies now. [link to www.voanews.com]

- Israel attacking Gaza [link to www.bloomberg.com]

- The USA 14 Trillion Dollars in debt [link to www.usdebtclock.org]

At this point does Tea Party, Republican or Democrat matter? (noticed how i reversed them from earlier? :o) )
Does funding another day of the USA government matter?

When you hear the word Government as an American you think of a system that is set in stone. Something no Americans (excluding Katrina victims and 911 victims) have lived with out from birth. Are you so sure this government is real though? Has this government protected you as a citizen? Has this government served you as an American?

My point is, stop waiting. Stop watching the news. Stop being distracted! It's already over! Even if the Government comes up with a solution to remain running, it is over!

The only thing left now is you. Your decisions, your principals and morals. What will you do? Will you keep buying into a broken system that is 14 Trillon dollars in debt? Will you watch Tv tonight go out and drink and abuse your freedoms even further? It is time for you to think for yourself and realize we are back to square one. We are right back to the time and same reasons/ evils that our founding fathers fought and drafted our constitution to escape.

Where is your faith in a god? Or humanity? Peace or Love? If you do not believe in God that you can't see or hear why continue to believe in a system you can see and hear failing? It's spelled out clearly.

Think for your self. Do not let them think for you!

Your world as you know it has ended my fellow Americans. While tomorrow it may drag on another day week or years, it is here. Face it. Do something about it. Prepare!

Do not be the one stuck saying why is this happening and expecting someone to help you. In the moment you reach that point, it is already to late. It will be every man for himself.

For those of you have read this in it's entirety. Thank You. Perhaps it is time we group together combine our wisdom and figure out what to do? If you are not American please do not be mad at us, ask how you can help. Not all of us are evil and brain washed.

So guys where do we start?
This kind of debate is great.  This is what it means to live in a democracy.  A good drag out, verbal fist fight, loving every moment of it!!!!

The 12 billion was a "grandstanding" act by the GOP because they knew it was a non-starter. Tell the entire story!

Our politicians can bomb the bejesus out of the rest of the world, but they act like little girls around the Tea Party scoundrels. Thump em! Then git back to actually governing!

Where is the editorial management of the New York Times? Perhaps they are no better than the Washington bureaucrats.

LBJ was familiar with this mindset. He said: Any person not willing to settle for half a loaf has never been hungry. One thing for sure: The Tea Partiers are mad as hell. Another thing for sure; Not one of them
has been hungry a day in their lives.

Tea baggier ideologies have GOT TO GO...2012 I cannot wait.....this budget cut will do NOTHING to garner jobs and it's a drop in the bucket of the deficit. Deficit EASY to get down 1. Let the tax cuts for the top 2% be repealed; 2. raise taxes for those making over $250,000; 3. GET OUT OF UNBRIDLED WAR WITHOUT END 4. Cut the military down to a postage stamp and get out gd noses OUT of other sovereign state’s business most especially in the Middle East. We are fighting now THREE and maybe FOUR wars if one counts Pakistan. How many more?

Bring jobs back to THIS country, make huge corporations pay and penalties for those who set up shop overseas to avoid taxes. Let corporations like GE be patriotic and pay their fair share!
